<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Impaling Thrust](/Feats.aspx?ID=1626) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 111 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Requirements**
You are wielding a melee weapon that deals piercing damage.

</column>

---

You impale your enemy and hold them in place with your weapon. Make a melee Strike with the required weapon. If the Strike hits and deals damage, your target is [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) until they successfully [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79), you attack with the required weapon, or you Release the required weapon, whichever comes first. When the target is no longer grabbed, they take [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) equal to the number of weapon damage dice.
name: Impaling Thrust
requirement: You are wielding a melee weapon that deals piercing damage.
